subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: With the Yankees in town and the Cubs playing better of late, the atmosphere around the ballpark had more of a postseason feel to it, even for fans of a team known to make any game feel like a celebration.
snippet: With the Yankees in town and the Cubs playing better of late, the atmosphere around the ballpark had more of a postseason feel to it, even for fans of a team known to make any game feel like a celebration.
